word_mean: 以呃呃有声，声音短促，持续不能自制为主要表现的特发性疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Even during the stockmarket crash of 1929, there was a mere hiccough before prices sailed higher.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使在1929年的股市崩溃期间, 它也仅仅打了喷嚏,随后继续飙升.

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) the state of having reflex spasms of the diaphragm accompanied by a rapid closure of the glottis producing an audible sound; sometimes a symptom of indigestion;
1. breathe spasmodically, and make a sound;

sentences.sentence: "When you have to hiccup, drink a glass of cold water"

sentences.en: I ate too quickly and got hiccoughs.
sentences.cn: 我吃得太快，结果不停地打嗝。

sentences.en: You can usually get rid of hiccoughs by drinking water very quickly.
sentences.cn: 你可以用快速喝水法消除打嗝。
